hero.title: Australian Labradoodles in Chile
hero.subtitle: Ethical breeding, early socialization and comprehensive support to integrate a balanced Doodle into your family.

soDoodle.title: Lola brought us more than tenderness: she gave us passion for this breed.
soDoodle.subtitle: When a dream comes true, a life full of furry love begins.
soDoodle.description: We are passionate breeders who believe in the importance of ethical breeding and early socialization. Each puppy is raised with love and attention to ensure the best possible start in life.

delivery.title: Puppy Delivery
delivery.description: We deliver our puppies between 65-70 days with everything needed for a smooth transition to their new home.

breed.title: The Breed: Australian Labradoodle
breed.subtitle: The Labradoodle is a breed that originated in Australia in the 1980s.
breed.description: The Labradoodle was created to produce a healthy, intelligent, and sociable dog with hypoallergenic and low-shedding coat, ideal for family life and therapeutic work.
